Class TriangleCellDrawer

java.lang.Object
be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle.gui.TriangleCellDrawer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class TriangleCellDrawer extends Object implements Cloneable
This class is an utility class for GUI component of the Game. It draw triangle shape (i.e. Piece).
Author:
Belegkarnil
